tags.name: simple-toolbar-button
tags.description:
`simple-toolbar-button`
a button for rich text editor (custom buttons can extend this)

Events:

  * `change-shortcut-keys` {`CustomEvent<{ button: this; shortcutKeys: any; }>`} - 

  * `register-button` {`CustomEvent<this>`} - 

  * `deregister-button` {`CustomEvent<this>`} - 

Attributes:

  * `controls` {`string`} - The `id` of the `simple-toolbar` that the toolbar controls.

  * `icon` {`string`} - Optional iron icon name for the button.

  * `label` {`string`} - Label for the icon.

  * `shortcut-keys` {`string`} - Optional space-sperated list of keyboard shortcuts for the editor

  * `target` - The active selected range, inherited from the toolbar

  * `toggled-icon` {`string`} - Optional iron icon name for the button if it is toggled.

  * `toggled-label` {`string`} - Label for the icon, if button is toggled.

  * `toggled` {`boolean`} - Can this button toggle?

  * `disabled` {`boolean`} - Is the button disabled? Default is false.

  * `show-text-label` {`boolean`} - Show text label even if an icon is named?

  * `toggles` {`boolean`} - Can this button toggle?

Properties:

  * `controls` {`string`} - The `id` of the `simple-toolbar` that the toolbar controls.

  * `icon` {`string`} - Optional iron icon name for the button.

  * `label` {`string`} - Label for the icon.

  * `shortcutKeys` {`string`} - Optional space-sperated list of keyboard shortcuts for the editor

  * `target` - The active selected range, inherited from the toolbar

  * `toggledIcon` {`string`} - Optional iron icon name for the button if it is toggled.

  * `toggledLabel` {`string`} - Label for the icon, if button is toggled.

  * `toggled` {`boolean`} - Can this button toggle?

  * `button` - gets button element

  * `currentLabel` {`string`} - current label based on toggled state

  * `currentIcon` {`string`} - current icon based on toggled state

  * `labelStyle` {`"offscreen" | null`} - label is offscreen (screenreader-only)

  * `isToggled` {`number`} - determines if button is toggled

  * `iconTemplate` {`TemplateResult`} - 

  * `labelTemplate` {`TemplateResult`} - 

  * `tooltipTemplate` {`TemplateResult`} - 

  * `buttonTemplate` {`TemplateResult`} - 

  * `disabled` {`boolean`} - Is the button disabled? Default is false.

  * `showTextLabel` {`boolean`} - Show text label even if an icon is named?

  * `toggles` {`boolean`} - Can this button toggle?

tags.name: simple-toolbar-more-button
tags.description:
`simple-toolbar-more-button`
a more button to toggle collapsed buttons in the rich text editor

Events:

  * `change-shortcut-keys` {`CustomEvent<{ button: this; shortcutKeys: any; }>`} - 

  * `register-button` {`CustomEvent<this>`} - 

  * `deregister-button` {`CustomEvent<this>`} - 

Attributes:

  * `collapse-max` {`string`} - The maximum size where all of the buttons display

  * `controls` {`string`} - The `id` of the `simple-toolbar` that the toolbar controls.

  * `icon` {`string`} - Optional iron icon name for the button.

  * `label` {`string`} - Label for the icon.

  * `shortcut-keys` {`string`} - Optional space-sperated list of keyboard shortcuts for the editor

  * `target` - The active selected range, inherited from the toolbar

  * `toggled-icon` {`string`} - Optional iron icon name for the button if it is toggled.

  * `toggled-label` {`string`} - Label for the icon, if button is toggled.

  * `toggled` {`boolean`} - Can this button toggle?

  * `disabled` {`boolean`} - Is the button disabled? Default is false.

  * `show-text-label` {`boolean`} - Show text label even if an icon is named?

  * `toggles` {`boolean`} - Can this button toggle?

Properties:

  * `collapseMax` {`string`} - The maximum size where all of the buttons display

  * `labelToggled` {`string`} - 

  * `controls` {`string`} - The `id` of the `simple-toolbar` that the toolbar controls.

  * `icon` {`string`} - Optional iron icon name for the button.

  * `label` {`string`} - Label for the icon.

  * `shortcutKeys` {`string`} - Optional space-sperated list of keyboard shortcuts for the editor

  * `target` - The active selected range, inherited from the toolbar

  * `toggledIcon` {`string`} - Optional iron icon name for the button if it is toggled.

  * `toggledLabel` {`string`} - Label for the icon, if button is toggled.

  * `toggled` {`boolean`} - Can this button toggle?

  * `button` - gets button element

  * `currentLabel` {`string`} - current label based on toggled state

  * `currentIcon` {`string`} - current icon based on toggled state

  * `labelStyle` {`"offscreen" | null`} - label is offscreen (screenreader-only)

  * `isToggled` {`number`} - determines if button is toggled

  * `iconTemplate` {`TemplateResult`} - 

  * `labelTemplate` {`TemplateResult`} - 

  * `tooltipTemplate` {`TemplateResult`} - 

  * `buttonTemplate` {`TemplateResult`} - 

  * `disabled` {`boolean`} - Is the button disabled? Default is false.

  * `showTextLabel` {`boolean`} - Show text label even if an icon is named?

  * `toggles` {`boolean`} - Can this button toggle?

tags.name: simple-toolbar
tags.description:
`simple-toolbar`
`a customizable toolbar`

Attributes:

  * `id` {`string`} - unique id

  * `__buttons` {`any[]`} - raw array of buttons

  * `collapsed` {`boolean`} - is toolbar collapsed?

  * `config` {`any[]`} - Custom configuration of toolbar groups and buttons.
(See default value for example using default configuration.)

  * `__focused` {`boolean`} - whether toolbar has focus

  * `__hovered` {`boolean`} - whether toolbar is hovered

  * `more-icon` {`string`} - icon for more button.

  * `more-label` {`string`} - label for more button.

  * `more-label-toggled` {`string`} - label for more button when toggled.

  * `more-show-text-label` {`boolean`} - show text label for more button.

  * `responsive-size` {`string`} - size of editor.

  * `sticky` {`boolean`} - Should toolbar stick to top so that it is always visible?

  * `shortcutKeys` - Optional space-sperated list of keyboard shortcuts for editor
to fire this button, see iron-a11y-keys for more info.

Properties:

  * `id` {`string`} - unique id

  * `__buttons` {`any[]`} - raw array of buttons

  * `buttons` - array of rendered buttons

  * `focused` {`boolean`} - does toolbar have focus

  * `hovered` {`boolean`} - is mouseover toolbar

  * `moreButton` {`TemplateResult`} - more button's template

  * `toolbarTemplate` {`TemplateResult`} - toolbar element's template

  * `collapsed` {`boolean`} - is toolbar collapsed?

  * `config` {`any[]`} - Custom configuration of toolbar groups and buttons.
(See default value for example using default configuration.)

  * `__focused` {`boolean`} - whether toolbar has focus

  * `__hovered` {`boolean`} - whether toolbar is hovered

  * `moreIcon` {`string`} - icon for more button.

  * `moreLabel` {`string`} - label for more button.

  * `moreLabelToggled` {`string`} - label for more button when toggled.

  * `moreShowTextLabel` {`boolean`} - show text label for more button.

  * `responsiveSize` {`string`} - size of editor.

  * `sticky` {`boolean`} - Should toolbar stick to top so that it is always visible?

  * `shortcutKeys` - Optional space-sperated list of keyboard shortcuts for editor
to fire this button, see iron-a11y-keys for more info.

  * `onfocus` - 

  * `onblur` - 

  * `onmouseover` - 

  * `onmouseout` -

`id` {`string`} - unique id
